Dialogue.Value: Hello!,I’m Billager， the Chat,Board Administrator!
At long last， the Chat Board,is finally open!
Let’s use this Chat Board to,spread information around!
Nice to meet you all!,I’m MakoMako! I’ve been,waiting for this Board!
Now I can talk with strangers!,It’s the true charm of the,Internet!
And to the admin，,thanks in advance!
Yo! I’m Donkichi， and I’m,nothin’ more than a mean,ol’ pig!
That said， this Board is for,funny stuff!,Thanks for playing along!
I can’t wait to see what kinds,of stories will be posted on,this Board!
This is a notice from the,NetAgents.
A ROM Navi who caused a,recent incident is on the run.
Because of this， we are,keeping watch over all,Genso and City Areas.
For everyone’s safety， if you,see this Navi， please inform,your nearest NetAgent.
We strongly advise you not to,talk to or confront ROM Navis.
That is all.,This has been a notice from,the NetAgents.
A ROM Navi?,That’s horrible!
Please catch them soon，,NetAgents!,For everyone’s sake!
Heyo. I’m Corona.,This is my first post here.
ROM is that net crime group,that’s been active recently....
I heard that Navi on the run,caused the incident at Genso,University.
Well， whatever.,I hope they get arrested soon.
I think I remember the name,ROM. Something about,the Internet Armageddon?
A group called ROM did bad,things back then， but is it the,same group?
You must be pretty old to,know about stuff from way,back then， Donkichi. (lol)
Anyways， all of the NetAgents,are doing their best.
I’m sure they’ll catch that,Navi soon.
We should support them from,the sidelines and not get in,their way.
Ho ho ho!,Tamezou is who I am.,Let’s get along well.
In my old age， I can add to,what Donkichi said.
The old ROM was the main,cause of the Cyber Wars.,Their leader was a scientist
who died before the war,ended， so ROM gradually,disbanded over time.
I’m sure that today’s ROM,isn’t the same group.
I bet some crook chose that,same name as a scare tactic.
Woah! Here come the people,who remember stuff from way,back then!
I’d read documents about the,past but I never thought that’s,how it really was back then.
Thanks， Tamezou!,I learned a lot!
There’s a lot of dark stories,going around， but I have,some good news!
It looks like a chip shop,opened in front of the,Genso Town station!
It’s called ”Voile”， and,I hear the manager is,a gorgeous woman!
Really!? Until now， I had to go,to Central City to buy chips!
Now I can buy chips without,having to ride the metro!
You live in Genso Town，,MakoMako? I’m jealous!
I live in Eien Town， so I still,can’t buy chips unless I ride,the metro. (lol)
I’ll make a detour next time!,I’m curious about that,gorgeous manager!
Ho ho ho!,You’re young， so it’s fine,to be so spirited!
I live in a town that doesn’t,have a metro station， so,I can’t go.
As long as I can use the,Internet， I can just shop at,the Square.
....But I am a bit jealous. (lol)
Hey! Have you all heard?,There’s going to be a,NetBattle tournament
called the N1 League!,The qualifiers are in,Eien Square! Who’s in?
A tournament， eh?,I’d love to， but I’m not too,confident.... (lol)
I just went to qualify for the,N1 League!
And....I didn’t make it!,Looks like my ordinary skill,just won’t cut it!
The N1 League has finally,come to a close!
As expected， the back-to-back,high-level battles were super,exciting!
Can I get that good if I practice,hard enough?
So how about that,N1 League!? I went to the,venue and saw it live!
I was kinda sad that the people,I was rooting for lost early on.
Everyone’s been talking,about the N1 League!
You went to watch it， Billager?,You must have a lot of energy!
I watched the broadcast on a,video streaming website.
Just watching it made me,want to improve my,Netbattling!
I watched the livestream too!
Isn’t the winning girl’s Navi，,Shanghai， the one protecting,these Areas?
They called her a ”temptress.”,Such an amazing Navi’s NetOp,must also be amazing〜!
My rich friend is taking us on,a cruise on the Seiren luxury,liner!
I’m so excited!,It’s my first time on a cruise!
That’s a good friend，Corona!,I hope you have a great time!
I’m waiting for the right ship so,I can take a cruise with royalty!
I could meet a princess!,Who knows where things might,go from there....
I can’t wait!
You don’t need a luxury liner,to go abroad.
Just six months ago I went to,Engelles and East Eurica!
I just can’t get enough of that,foreign air!
Geez....,I've never gone abroad before.
Is there a East Eurica and,West Eurica?,What’s the difference?
To know why there’s East and,West，you need to know the,origins of Eurica.
In the twentieth century the,eastern coast of the Atlantic,was called Europe.
After two world wars，the area,became unstable.
The United States and Europe,joined as one，and Eurica was,born.
The United States is what,West Eurica used to be called.
And Europe became what we,know as East Eurica.
You have the memory of an,elephant，Tamezou!,I love history!
We live in peaceful Japan,so this is all we know.
It must have been hard in,the old days.
No，I hope war never reaches,us or ever happens again.
ROM has been quiet recently,and all is at peace.
It wasn’t too long ago that,there was a big incident every,couple of weeks!
I guess this is thanks to the,good work of the NetAgents.
I like peace more than,anything.
I don’t want to think about if,anything were to happen to me,while I’m out walking.
There is a rumor....
The one who solved the ROM,crisis and defused incident,after incident....
....is not a NetAgent!
The operator of that Navi,simply was in the right,place again and again!
Wow! I want to be a hero,like that some day!
We have temporarily dealt,with the mysterious black Navis,behind the attacks.
However，the situation is not,contained and the Navis may,return.
If you see a suspicious Navi，,run or jack out immediately.
Thank you for your hard work，,NetAgents!
There were a few victims at,this Square.,A terrible tragedy.
I was so scared!
I was there when the black,Navi attacked the owner of,the rice shop!
I think I’m traumatized....
But it was truly incredible that,Miss Shanghai took them down,immediately!!
I feel like a coward....,I ran and did nothing when the,black Navis attacked.
Shanghai is the beautiful,blonde Navi，right?
Wasn’t she the one who dealt,with the ROM incidents?
Did you see the TV?,Did ROM just issue a,declaration of war?!
Between this and the black,Navis，monsters are no longer,contained to the cyber-world.
....I heard a rumor that,someone saw a black Navi,in the real world.
I heard that too，but it’s only,a rumor.
I’m turning off my electricity,and staying inside after I write,this message.
It seems peace was a lie and,I was wrong about what I,posted the other day.
Don’t give in to fear!,That’s what ROM wants you,to do!
In times like this，normal folks,like us need to stand up with,strong hearts!
Donkichi is right!,Don’t be scared!
All of us can be heroes by,doing whatever we can do to,help!
I’ve been working with the,NetAgents’ Battle Chip,collection drive!
If our chips can save the,world，we have to be able to,do at least this much!
I’m sorry for being afraid!,Corona is right!
I might not be able to do,much，but I’ll do what I can!
Have you seen the news?!,ROM has been defeated!
We no longer have to fear,the Black Navis or ROM,NetCriminals!
Every day reminds me of why,peace is the best!
But net crime won’t stop even,if ROM has been destroyed.
Each of us has to be strong,and stop crime wherever we,see it!
Just like the saviour of the,world，Miss Shanghai!
